comment._content: Troops at San Antonio camp healthier than those elsewhere -- NYT, June 18, 1911: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9E03E2D71031E2...

comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content: Robert F. Collier Wright B biplane rented to US Army for $1 a month.  Aircraft arrived San Antonio  February 21, 1911
